TopicTitle: Milestone Award for the Island Airbase??????

Articles.Content:
First off, has anyone else playing a new career game been watching their milestone awards? You can see them with the little contract button in the top right corner. There are all sorts of new ones, and one I got today was quite a surprise.

Today I finished the early career grind and finally got to making some jets with the new engines. And came up with a couple decent ones; one of which I flew over to the old island airbase.

And much to my surprise, I got a milestone award for "finding an old airbase on an island", or something to that effect.

Makes me seriously wonder if there are milestone awards for finding other cool stuff.

Somehow I missed that button. Thanks!

I'm going to take my plane there this evening!

They said that there'll be more scattered around the system...
